doc.title: Versus
doc.plot: Mr. White, an operative for an unseen Russian, double-crosses Mr. Noir on a rooftop parking lot, stealing a computer file from him and stepping into the elevator to descend. Noir races to the elevator in time to enter as it starts its descent. He engages White in a furious battle of skilled martial arts within the elevator's confined space. On the third floor, waiting impatiently for the slow-moving car, is a stranger, Ms. Grey, ignoring the Christmas music and holding an umbrella. Neither White nor Noir had anticipated her presence. How will it play out?
